dcterms:description: The Penn Treebank is used to demonstrate the effectiveness of a memory augmented LSTM language model, achieving state-of-the-art results with fewer parameters than competitors.
dcterms:title: Penn Treebank

dcterms:creator: Stephen Merity
Caiming Xiong
James Bradbury
Richard Socher
dcterms:description: The wikitext2 dataset is utilized to evaluate the performance of the memory augmented LSTM language model, achieving near state-of-the-art results.
dcterms:title: wikitext2
